DTS:LogProvider.DTS:Description: Writes log entries for events to a SQL Server database
DTS:LogProvider.DTS:ObjectName: SSIS log provider for SQL Server

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource: WHILE (SELECT MAX(id_periodo) FROM H_ORD_INT_DET) >= (SELECT MAX(id_periodo_prestacion) FROM D_PERIODO_TRIMESTRE_ARANCELES) BEGIN INSERT INTO D_PERIODO_TRIMESTRE_ARANCELES SELECT dbo.PeriodosPosteriores(MAX(id_periodo_prestacion), 5), MAX(id_trimestre_aranceles)+1 FROM D_PERIODO_TRIMESTRE_ARANCELES INSERT INTO D_PERIODO_TRIMESTRE_ARANCELES SELECT dbo.PeriodoSiguiente(CAST(dbo.Devuelve_Fecha(MAX(id_periodo_prestacion))AS VARCHAR(10))), MAX(id_trimestre_aranceles)FROM D_PERIODO_TRIMESTRE_ARANCELES INSERT INTO D_PERIODO_TRIMESTRE_ARANCELES SELECT dbo.PeriodoSiguiente(CAST(dbo.Devuelve_Fecha(MAX(id_periodo_prestacion))AS VARCHAR(10))), MAX(id_trimestre_aranceles)FROM D_PERIODO_TRIMESTRE_ARANCELES END

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource: DELETE D_TRIMESTRE_ARANCELES WHERE id_trimestre_aranceles = (SELECT MAX(id_trimestre_aranceles) FROM D_PERIODO_TRIMESTRE_ARANCELES) INSERT INTO D_TRIMESTRE_ARANCELES SELECT MAX(id_trimestre_aranceles), '' FROM D_PERIODO_TRIMESTRE_ARANCELES UPDATE D_TRIMESTRE_ARANCELES SET de_trimestre_aranceles = CASE WHEN RIGHT((SELECT MAX(id_periodo_prestacion) FROM D_PERIODO_TRIMESTRE_ARANCELES where id_trimestre_aranceles IN (SELECT MAX(id_trimestre_aranceles) FROM D_PERIODO_TRIMESTRE_ARANCELES) GROUP BY id_trimestre_aranceles),2) = 01 THEN 'Dic-'+CAST(RIGHT(D.id_anio, 2) AS VARCHAR(2)) WHEN RIGHT((SELECT MAX(id_periodo_prestacion) FROM D_PERIODO_TRIMESTRE_ARANCELES where id_trimestre_aranceles IN (SELECT MAX(id_trimestre_aranceles) FROM D_PERIODO_TRIMESTRE_ARANCELES) GROUP BY id_trimestre_aranceles),2) = 07 THEN 'Jun-'+CAST(RIGHT(D.id_anio, 2) AS VARCHAR(2)) END FROM D_TRIMESTRE_ARANCELES T INNER JOIN D_PERIODO_TRIMESTRE_ARANCELES P ON (P.id_trimestre_aranceles=T.id_trimestre_aranceles) INNER JOIN D_PERIODO D ON (P.id_periodo_prestacion=D.id_periodo) INNER JOIN D_MES M ON (D.ID_MES=M.ID_MES) WHERE t.de_trimestre_aranceles = ''
